name: Michelangelo Grigni
content: Michelangelo Grigni Michel­an­gelo Grigni Associate Professor, Emory University, Computer Science and Mathematics. Email: mgrigni@emory.edu Meet: hours, zoom, calendly Office: MSC (Math & Science Center), Room W426 Mail: Emory CS Dept. 400 Dowman Dr NE, Suite W401 Atlanta GA 30322-1005, USA Phone: 404-727-7922 Interests: complexity, algorithms (vita) Teaching (Fall 2025): CS-326-1: Analysis of Algorithms CS-526-1: Graduate Algorithms Putnam Exam Quote: Don't believe everything you read on the internet. Abraham Lincoln Last Modified: 15 May 2025
